titleStmt.title: The admirable life of Saint VVenefride virgin, martyr, abbesse. Written in Latin aboue 500. yeares ago, by Robert, monke and priour of Shrewsbury, of the ven. Order of S. Benedict. Deuided into two bookes. And now translated into English, out of a very ancient and authenticall manuscript, for the edification and comfort of Catholikes. By I.F. of the Society of Iesus
titleStmt.author: Robert, Prior of Shrewsbury, d. 1167.
Falconer, John, 1577-1656.
Baes, Martin, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the English College Press] Permissu superioru[m],

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, and signed: Mart. Baes. f.
Running title reads: The admirable life of S. Wenefride.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
